tva:Genre.tva:Name: Humanities
tva:Genre.tva:Definition: The branches of learning regarded as having primarily a cultural character and which usually include language, literature, history, mathematics and philosophy

tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. The service provider considers there to be similarities between the currently described resource and the referenced resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). Suggestion to record a programme which the broadcaster recommends because of what the user is watching.It could also point to a Web site proposing related programmes ‘recommended’ by the service provider. A recommendation can be used to suggest content or services or services bundles with a similar subject.

tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: 香川これからの活躍に期待ガンバ ﻿
I've already put a﻿ bet on for kagawa to win PFA player of the year (City Fan) hate to admit but a terrific player he's just as good as our lad silva.
@rammo jerry Why don't you fuck off you no life twat﻿
なんかシュートが少なくないか？﻿
This pot noodle﻿ is good bier liverpoolfc have better midfielders than the whole Of utd. Charlie Adam gerrard Lucas downing etc far better than utd have to offer
aside from gerrard, who gets injured every week, Liverpool are﻿ mediocre. Their results confirm this, dip shit.
I dont﻿ know who i love more kagawa or the guy who makes these videos.......MUFC4LIFE
shinji is﻿ perfect player.
Yet﻿ you battled for a mid table position last season....
not overrated but underrated﻿
At the age of 23 kagawa is an amazing player, great on and off the﻿ ball and shows great determination to win the ball back. And is also very unselfish
ちちいわ なやはあちいさ﻿
terry,﻿ is that you?
Charlie Adam better than Paul﻿ Scholes? Kill yourself.
I﻿ always see a little Kagawa-Goetze every time i watch Kagawa-Cleverley play.
がんばれー﻿
Lol Liverpool....... is shit •_•﻿
i'm surprised barca didn't﻿ pick him up
Lets not forget, gerrard only stays at liverpool because he is married into gangsters, who﻿ wont allow him to leave the club
在日を日本人として見ているアンタは何なんだ。﻿
youre absolutely﻿ right

How can﻿ you say hes the better player when hes played more games? Kagawa only played 2league games and hazard already played 3league games and a community shield game so wait until the end of the season to judge
Kagawa own Hazshit. Chelshit fans GTFO.﻿

Reviewer.Books: The Curious Incident of the Dog in the Night-Time
